summary.span: 为表示数据源中数据成员的属性提供一个类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter for a property representing a data member in a data source.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 您通常不访问的类型转换器直接。You typically do not access a type converter directly. 此实现旨在用于通过数据绑定控件在设计时，并使用实例化属性上。This implementation of is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a on a property.
